name: Don't Do the Dishes!
description:
Delay the inevitable washing up! Pile the dishes in the sink until one of them falls and you have to get scrubbing. How many will you stack?

Click and drag the dishes to pile them up. Dishes that fall and break will not count towards your score.

Made for Ludum Dare 50. Theme: 'Delay the Inevitable'.

Music: Sunny Day Walk by Lobo Loco

Sounds:

Glass clinking

Metal handling bars in container

Hitting metal object with metal

Plate-1

Plate-3

Platos 5

Platos 4
